title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 06 July 2015 - XWiki

09:47 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
09:57 <vmassol> good morning everyone  
09:57 <vmassol> FYI I'm working on fixing http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-12269 today by doing the redesign I mentioned in the issue  
09:57 <vmassol> going to take me 1 or 2 days  
10:00 <gsmeria> has joined #xwiki  
10:03 <vmassol> msmeria: hi  
10:03 <vmassol> I'm looking at http://design.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Proposal/NestedSpaces?viewer=changes&rev2=80.5  
10:03 <vmassol> and I wanted to mentionned that what you tested is not the correct thing  
10:03 <vmassol> \*Mention  
10:04 <vmassol> "Hooks mean you don't have to rebuild XWiki from sources to be able to implement the listed features below. In addition you can upgrade without breaking compatibility (If you upgrade and you wish to benefit from changes made to VM files in your overridden VMs you’ll need to perform some manual merges)."  
10:04 <vmassol> this section means that it \*is possible\* to implement the feature using an existing hook  
10:04 <vmassol> not that it's implemented!  
10:04 <vmassol> :)  
10:06 <msmeria> vmassol: thanks!  
10:07 <vmassol> msmeria: i think you should removed the content of the tested column  
10:08 <vmassol> what I'll do  on my side is describe how to implement it with details  
10:08 <gsmeria> has quit  
10:09 <gsmeria> has joined #xwiki  
10:11 <msmeria> vmassol: I deleted the content from the Tested column  
10:11 <vmassol> yeo thanks  
10:11 <vmassol> \*yep  
10:12 <msmeria> vmassol: please let me know once you edit the document with the instructions  
10:12 <vmassol> yes ok thanks msmeria
